#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
int main()
{         
	int i,cnt,j,n,fg,k,t;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	   cin>>n>>k;
	   cin>>s;
	   for(i=0,fg=0;i<n;)
	   {
	   	j=i;
	   	while(j<n && s[i]==s[j])
	   	 j++;
	   	if(j-i>=k)
		{
			fg=1;
			break;
		}     
	   	i=j; 
	   }
	   if(fg==0)
	   {
	    cout<<"-1"<<endl;
	    continue;
	   }
	   for(i=0,cnt=0;i<n;)
	   {
	   	j=i;
	   	while(j<n && j<i+k && s[i]==s[j])
	   	 j++;
	   	cnt=cnt+1;
		i=j;    
	   }
	   cout<<cnt<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
